properties.title: Jul 10, 2010: The Divine Spark Within You at HR MacMillan Space Centre
properties.description: An evening of talks, meditation, light refreshments, and a special preview of "Secret Quest" Date and time: Saturday, July 10, 2010 - 7:00pm - 9:00pm (Doors open at: 6:30pm) Location: HR MacMillan Space Centre, Auditorium, 1100 Chestnut Street, Vancouver Contact: Justin or Mike at the Gnostic Movement – Vancouver E-Mail: vancouver@gnosticmovement.com Phone: 1-877-GNOSIS-1 URL: http://www.gnosticawakenings.com/centers/vancouver/events/divine-spark-within-you

properties.title: Sep  4, 2010: Fanfair Fest at Rocky Mountaineer Station
properties.description:
Fanfair Fest (F3) is coming to Vancouver, British Columbia in September 2010!
On September 4 and 5, 2010, the F3 inaugural convention in Vancouver will showcase art, paraphernalia, and creative talent that define the spirit of youthful imagination and sci-fi fantasy fun. Our convention will include Comics, Anime, Games, Toys, Video games, Sci-Fi and Fantasy.
We are "Where Geek is Chic". This is not your average comic show. F3 is the Vancouver pop culture convention not to be missed! Check out our amazing collection of guests, vendors, contests, interactive activities and other events. And we'll be adding more in the coming months.
Mark your calendar to join us, in September, for the first year of Fanfair Fest!

properties.title: Jul 10, 2010: Vancouver Singles Haunted Ghost Tour & Pub Night at Vancouver
properties.description: Join Meet Market Adventures for a bone chilling tour around the Haunted Buildings in Gastown. We begin on Water Street and then step back into Vancouver's past to learn the haunted history of the Gastown area. You'll soon learn that it has its own share of bloody, mysterious ghost stories. Your grim reaper guide takes you on a tour where you will learn about a terrible curse placed on the original town of Granville. We will hear stories of the infamous Gassy Jack, the Great Fire, Blood Alley and the Gaoler's Mews; ghastly stories of over twenty-five ghost encounters ranging from the friendly and interesting to bone-chilling scares. This tour appeals to those who crave a deeper look into the history of Gastown as well as anyone who has an interest in the realm of the supernatural. After the tour concludes, we mingle over spirits and share ghost stories of your own. Please wear comfortable shoes and dress for the weather as you'll get the chills with or without cold weather. Details are subject to change without notice. To reserve your spot please contact us: 1-800-239-0542info@meetmarketadventures.com

properties.title: Jul 13, 2010: Date Great Vancouver Singles with 25dates.com Speed Dating! at Room Eighteen
properties.description: Meet 20 singles in one night! Hosted by Canada's premier speed dating company; 25dates.com (as featured on CNN Headline News). This event is for Men ages 35-45 and Women ages 30-40. Come out for this fabulous night which includes hors d'oeuvres and your chance to meet up to 20 singles. Don't get a match? Come back for free! Sign up for this or other events at: http://www.25dates.com

properties.title: Sep  7, 2010: Introduction to Digital SLR Photography Tues + Wed Night - Syx Langmann at Cambrian Hall
properties.description: This session is a condensed version of our regular 10 week course for people who wish to finish sooner. This session will run twice weekly on Tuesday and Thursday nights for 5 weeks. This course is for everybody looking for a great introduction to the fascinating world of digital photography. Learn all about your digital camera, starting at the basics of its operation to using it effectively and with confidence in any kind of shooting situation. Getting your pictures off your camera as well as basic image manipulation and a variety of output (printing) options will be addressed. Your skilled Instructor will also teach you basic photography concepts, such as exposure calculation, depth-of-field, effective composition guidelines and how to use your flash effectively. You will have the opportunity to practice your newly acquired skills during field trips and a full scale studio shooting session with professional models. With a strong emphasize on practical hands-on shooting exercises, this course will make you feel in complete control over your digital camera equipment. In-depth review and critique sessions are held to give you valuable and encouraging feedback. VPW has strictly limited this class size to 15 students only. This will ensure that you will get the best possible learning experience with lots of quality one-on-one instruction from your instructor. VPW uses the latest camera, computer and lighting equipment for all of its courses and workshops. If you have been disappointed in the past taking courses elsewhere, come on in and give us a try. Click the following link to register this event: Register powered by RegOnline

properties.title: Sep  4, 2010: Basic Intensive Photography Weekend Workshop 0910_1 at Cambrian Hall
properties.description: Our Basic Photography Course condensed into one intensive Weekend Workshop. Are you looking for a great first course in photography, but don’t have the time to commit to a 10 week program? Then, this Workshop is for you! In only 2 days, you will learn the most important basic photography concepts, such as exposure calculation, depth-of-field, effective composition guidelines and how to use your camera to get consistent high uality results. Students are welcome to bring a digital or film camera to this Workshop. You'll learn about the differences between film and digital capture, how to get great exposures (even in manual mode), and how to choose the right lens for the job. On Sunday, this hands-on Workshop will also give you the opportunity to practice your newly acquired skills during a full scale studio shooting session with professional models. Limited to only 15 students, this intensive Workshop is designed to leave you feel comfortable and in control of your camera and its operation. It is a great Workshop for people looking to refresh their skills, and a stepping stone and foundation to further photography training. Click the following link to register this event: Register powered by RegOnline

properties.title: Sep  5, 2010: VancouverSingles Urban Hike at Throughout Vancouver
properties.description: Join Meet Market Adventures and other active singles as we hike Pacific Spirit Regional Park. Established in 1989, 885 acre (763 hectare) park is the largest green space in Vancouver. This Park surrounds UBC with forests and beaches. Within minutes of entering the park we will find ourselves in another realm; this early logged forest has regenerated itself and is comprised of a rich mix of coniferous and deciduous trees. A dozen varieties of ferns carpet the forest floor. Underfoot, decades of accumulated mulch softens your steps. We’ll revel in the sounds of forest life as we explore its lush interior, looking for wildlife and all the things that hikers hope to find when they venture out. So come on out and enjoy the sunshine and fresh air in this oasis in the middle of the concrete jungle. After the hike, we will head to a local restaurant for some drinks and food. Most trails are gentle and offer visitors the opportunity of a quick getaway from the pace of the city. "Where Singles & Adventure Meet"http://www.meetmarketadventures.com To reserve your spot please contact us directly by phone at 1-800-239-0542, via email: info@meetmarketadventures.com or sign up through our website! Details are subject to change without notice. To reserve your spot please contact us: 1-800-239-0542info@meetmarketadventures.com

properties.title: Sep  7, 2010: Vancouver Approach Her Anytime, Anywhere at Throughout Vancouver
